pageContext.claim: “The Mueller report came out and they said he [Donald Trump Jr.] did nothing wrong. The only thing is it's oppo research. … My son was totally exonerated by Mueller.”
pageContext.analysis: Donald Trump Jr. was not totally exonerated by special counsel Robert Mueller. In regards to Trump Jr.'s efforts to communicate with the Russians and solicit dirt on Hillary Clinton during the campaign, the special counsel said "a prosecution would encounter difficulties proving that Campaign officials or individuals connected to the Campaign willfully violated the law."
